Kick off.details: The grand kick off of the Dies week 2018

Reception.details: The official Dies Natalis reception of 2018

Dinner.details: The traditional Dies Dinner to kick off the week in style

Lunch lecture.details: A very interesting lecture from a real Cheerleader! This lunch lecture has a broodje Leo included!

Beer cycling.details: Go with a large bike around Delftse Hout!

Special beer night.details: This is not your typical wednesday evening. Instead, we have some very nice special beers for you! We advice you to have had a good meal before consuming alcohol.

Rollerskating.details: This is the opportunity to rollerskate in Lorre! Please make sure to also give your shoe size when signing up!
